nodes.text: A Tainted Nightsister Crystal was a type of kyber crystal created by members of the Nightsisters to use in weaponry similar to that of lightsabers. The crystal was created if soaked in Dathomir's magical ichor, which perverted the crystal's connection to the Force. A blade created using the crystal emitted a putrid, choking green smoke.
A green gas-emitting bladed-weapon existed in the form of Talzin's sword, a sword conjured from magical ichor by Nightsister Mother Talzin and used to combat Jedi Master Mace Windu.
